definition: to seal (with official stamp)/to stamp/fig. to ratify/to put lid on (cooking pot)/to cap/to build an extension or additional storey
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: We enlarged the house by adding a west wing.
sentences.chinese: 我们加盖西厢房以扩建房屋。

sentences.english: The swimming pool will be roofed over in October this year.
sentences.chinese: 游泳池将于今年十月加盖屋顶。

sentences.english: Cutting late autumn or early spring, also decked film to prevent harm winter.
sentences.chinese: 早春或晚秋扦插时，还应加盖薄膜，以防冬害。

sentences.english: "Hongshenghuo works"the name seal on the opposite work.
sentences.chinese: 作品反面加盖红胜火作品名称专用章。

sentences.english: A document issued to sub-branches shall be sealed by all the issuers .
sentences.chinese: 联合下发的公文，发文机关都应当加盖印章。
所有货物都加盖了检验合格封印。

sentences.english: This agreement is delivered under my hand and seal.
sentences.chinese: 本协定今日经我签名并加盖印章发出。

sentences.english: The contract was signed by authorized representatives of both parties and the date stamp.
sentences.chinese: 本合同于双方授权代表签字并加盖公章之日起生效。

sentences.english: The pipe ends are sealed with cups to prevent ingress of foreign objectives.
sentences.chinese: 管端应加盖密封防止异物进入。

sentences.english: Cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
sentences.chinese: 加盖，在微波炉种高火加热2分钟直到皮脆肉嫩。

sentences.english: The arbitral award shall be signed by arbitrators and affixed with the seals of the arbitration commission.
sentences.chinese: 裁决书由仲裁员签名，加盖仲裁委员会印章。

sentences.english: The certificates shall be signed by the Chairperson of the Board and sealed with the JV Company's seal.
sentences.chinese: 该报告应经董事会主席签字并加盖合资公司的印章。

sentences.english: So King Darius put the decree in writing.
sentences.chinese: 于是大流士王立这禁令，加盖玉玺。

sentences.english: They built a new room above [over] the garage.
sentences.chinese: 他们在车房上加盖了一个新房间。

sentences.english: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 土豆放在炒锅中，加冷水，加盖，用高火煮开。

sentences.english: Copies of documents Party B provides shall be affixed with Party B's official seal.
sentences.chinese: 乙方提供的文件为复印件的，必须加盖乙方公章。

definition: to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
